page.title: 10BALLATER CAR-PARKS SURVEY
page.content:
CHURCH SQUARE
Tourists approaching from the East usually come to this car-park because the other one is not sign-posted. This car-park though is not favoured by locals because it is further from the shops and off the main street. It is quite large and because of all the cars and coaches that use the park there a toilet was built. Usually this car-park is very quiet in the morning but by the afternoon it is very busy with coachloads of tourists and visitors cars. There are no charges for parking here.
